title: Rivian, Robinhood, Bumble: How some of 2021's biggest IPOs are faring - Yahoo Finance
content: Rivian, Robinhood, Bumble: How some of 2021's biggest IPOs are faring  Yahoo Finance
description: A flurry of large and small IPOs went public during the pandemic. Some of these today, are notably worse off than others. Looking at the biggest IPOâ€™s of 2021 and 2020, measured by the largest amount of money raised, shows shares of the top five initial public offerings of last year, fared worse than the largest ones to go public in 2020.
